Scenario1-Adult_Member_Viewing_Other_Adu.TC-1: Given an ADULT dependent (Omnibus rule) WHEN requesting to view other Adult member claims THEN should NOT be allowed to view claim records

Scenario2-Child_Member_Viewing_Other_Chi.TC-1: GIVEN Child Member WHEN requesting to view other Child's claim records THEN should NOT be allowed to view other child's claim record
